numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that many young people believe that the world is getting better.
2. I notice that almost no adults who are 40 years old or older agree.
3. I believe that young people are more optimistic about the future.
4. I believe that young people are more optimistic because young people still have their whole lives ahead of them.
5. Older people have lived longer than young people.
6. Older people have experienced more things than young people.
7. I wonder whether the same young people said that the world is getting better in this graph.
8. I wonder whether these young people will have the same opinion when these young people are 40 years old or older.
